commandDescription: Launches an AppOps relational data deployment for a scratch org.
sourceFlagDescription: source connection name or record id
destinationFlagDescription: destination connection name or record id
dataSetFlagDescription: data set to deploy name or record id
deploymentPlanFlagDescription: deployment plan to deploy name or record id
errorNoConnectionFound: No active connections with the name or record ID '%s' found in the dev hub control org.
errorSourceAndTargetFlags: Specify either the source or destination connection parameter, but not both.
errorDatasetAndPlanFlags: Specify either the data set or deployment plan parameter, but not both.
errorNoDatasetAndPlanFlags: Specify either the data set or deployment plan parameter.
errorNoDataSetFound: No active data set with the name or record ID '%s' found in the dev hub control org.
errorNoDeploymentPlanFound: No deployment plan with the name or record ID '%s' found in the dev hub control org.
errorNoControlOrgFound: No active control org conneciton found in the dev hub control org.
errorInsertingDeploymentResult: Failed to insert the deployment result: %s
